Experience the Renaissance: I would travel back to the Renaissance period to witness the art, science, and literature of that era firsthand.
Meet historical figures: I would visit the past to meet important historical figures like Leonardo da Vinci, Marie Curie, or Martin Luther King Jr.

Witness major historical events: I would travel to witness significant historical events like the signing of the Declaration of Independence, the Apollo 11 moon landing, or the fall of the Berlin Wall.
Visit the future: I would travel to the future to see how society has evolved and what technological advancements have been made.
Explore different time periods in parallel universes: I would travel to parallel universes to explore different time periods that exist in those realities.
